Mongo DB

class mongo_db.company_data.CompanyData(symbol, security, gics_sector, gics_industry, country, region, website_url=None, csr_reports=None)[source]

Bases: object

A class representing a company’s data.

symbol

The ticker symbol of the company.

Type:

str

security

The security name of the company.

Type:

str

gics_sector

The GICS sector the company belongs to.

Type:

str

gics_industry

The GICS industry the company belongs to.

Type:

str

country

The country where the company is based.

Type:

str

region

The region where the company is located.

Type:

str

website_url

The company’s website URL.

Type:

str, optional

csr_reports

Dictionary holding CSR report URLs by year.

Type:

dict, optional

created_at

The time the company record was created.

Type:

datetime

updated_at

The last time the company record was updated.

Type:

datetime

to_dict()[source]

Converts the CompanyData object to a dictionary.

Returns:

A dictionary representation of the CompanyData instance.

Return type:

dict

class mongo_db.company_data.CompanyDatabase(db)[source]

Bases: object

A class to handle database operations for CompanyData.

collection

MongoDB collection to manage company data.

Type:

pymongo.collection.Collection

add_company(company)[source]

Add a new company to the database. :param company: CompanyData object

add_csr_report(symbol, report_link)[source]

Add a CSR report link to an existing company. :param symbol: Ticker symbol of the company. :param report_link: URL of the CSR report.

delete_company(symbol)[source]

Delete a company from the database. :param symbol: Ticker symbol of the company.

get_company(symbol)[source]

Retrieve a company’s details by symbol. :param symbol: Ticker symbol of the company. :return: CompanyData object or None if not found.

update_gics_sector(symbol, new_gics_sector)[source]

Update the gics_sector of a company. :param symbol: Ticker symbol of the company. :param new_gics_sector: New gics_sector security.

mongo_db.company_data.connect_to_mongo()[source]

Connects to a MongoDB instance, based on whether the code is running inside Docker or locally.

Returns:

The MongoDB client if successful, else None.

Return type:

pymongo.MongoClient or None

mongo_db.company_data.create_mongo_seed_file(df)[source]

Converts a Pandas DataFrame to a list of dictionaries and saves it as a JSON file for MongoDB import.

Parameters:

df (pandas.DataFrame) – The DataFrame to convert and save.

Returns:

The file path of the generated seed file.

Return type:

str

mongo_db.company_data.import_seed_to_mongo()[source]

Imports seed data from a JSON file into the MongoDB database.

Returns:

The MongoDB collection after importing the data.

Return type:

pymongo.collection.Collection

mongo_db.company_data.load_sql_to_pandas()[source]
mongo_db.company_data.main()[source]
mongo_db.company_data.reset_database()[source]

Prompts the user for confirmation and, if confirmed, resets the MongoDB database by dropping the ‘companies’ collection and importing seed data.

Returns:

None
